channel.title: 2 Errors in player.java
channel.description:
I am upgrading my server to support Silabsoft's client. I was up to the stage of editing the player.java file when i got this error.
[code] Initializing... Compiling core classes.. Step 1 of 1... Player.java:781: cannot find symbol symbol : method isFullHelm(int) location: class Item if (!Item.isFullHelm(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && !Item.isFullMask(playe rEquipment[playerHat]) &&(playerLook[0] != 1)) { ^ Player.java:781: cannot find symbol symbol : method isFullMask(int) location: class Item if (!Item.isFullHelm(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && !Item.isFullMask(playe rEquipment[playerHat]) &&(playerLook[0] != 1)) { ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 2 errors Operation completed. Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
I had alot more errors with the code and these 2 are the only that remains. Help would be very much appreciated. The code looks fine to me I can't see anything out of place yet it decides it still wan'ts to be hell. :P[br][size=1]Posted on: 04 October 2007, 20:58:18[/size][hr]Ah fixed it!
[code]if (!Item.isFullHelm(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && !Item.isFullMask(playerEquipment[playerHat]) &&(playerLook[0] != 1)) {[/code]
It should of been.
[code]if (!Item.isFullHelm(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && !Item4.isFullMask(playerEquipment[playerHat]) &&(playerLook[0] != 1)) {[/code]
Just incase for those who wanted to know how I fixed it. :) It was a slight error in the tutorial theres a lesson learnt for me here. :)

item.title: 2 Errors in player.java
item.dc:creator: @EwfsPrince EwfsPrince
item.description:
@EwfsPrince wrote:

I am upgrading my server to support Silabsoft’s client.
I was up to the stage of editing the player.java file when i got this error.

Initializing...
Compiling core classes.. Step 1 of 1...
Player.java:781: cannot find symbol
symbol  : method isFullHelm(int)
location: class Item
      if (!Item.isFullHelm(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && !Item.isFullMask(playe
rEquipment[playerHat]) &&(playerLook[0] != 1)) {
               ^
Player.java:781: cannot find symbol
symbol  : method isFullMask(int)
location: class Item
      if (!Item.isFullHelm(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && !Item.isFullMask(playe
rEquipment[playerHat]) &&(playerLook[0] != 1)) {
                                                               ^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
2 errors
Operation completed.
Press any key to continue . . .

I had alot more errors with the code and these 2 are the only that remains. Help would be very much appreciated. The code looks fine to me I can’t see anything out of place yet it decides it still wan’ts to be hell. :P[br][size=1]Posted on: 04 October 2007, 20:58:18[/size][hr]Ah fixed it!

if (!Item.isFullHelm(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && !Item.isFullMask(playerEquipment[playerHat]) &&(playerLook[0] != 1)) {

It should of been.

if (!Item.isFullHelm(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && !Item4.isFullMask(playerEquipment[playerHat]) &&(playerLook[0] != 1)) {

Just incase for those who wanted to know how I fixed it.
It was a slight error in the tutorial theres a lesson learnt for me here.

Read full topic
